timeline.message:
Add UTF8 support for .properties files
Based on https://github.com/EssentialsX/Essentials/commit/edaa4f6978b2e6d091919f775b4907d159437116, this allows messages files to be read in UTF8 without the need for native2ascii conversion.
Remove conversion of properties files during build

timeline.author: JRoy

timeline.bodyText: Pretty sure URL#openConnection never returns null and just throws an IOException
timeline.author: JRoy

replies.bodyText: If the URL doesn't point to anything, #openConnection() will return null, so if someone puts an invalid/custom locale in then it'll cause a NPE here.
replies.author: mdcfe
